Package com.ex5adiyakobymichaelzargari.controllers

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.ex5adiyakobymichaelzargari.controllers.AdminController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
AdminController handles all administrative actions such as managing users and chat rooms.
